definition: rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although

sentences.english: I greatly appreciate this opportunity to visit this beautiful and affluent country.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感謝有此機會來訪問這個美麗富饒的國家。

sentences.english: A new city is rising up in middle Jiangsu plain.
sentences.chinese: 在美麗富饒的蘇中平原上，一座新城正在崛起。

sentences.english: Company 104 National Road east and west of the beautiful and fertile Weishan Lake.
sentences.chinese: 公司東臨104國道，西臨美麗富饒的微山湖畔。

sentences.english: I greatly appreciate this opportunity to visit this beautiful and prosperous country.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感謝有此機會訪問這個美麗富饒的國家。

sentences.english: Apple is at risk of losing rich Chinese in the future.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果正面臨着在未來失去富饒的中國市場的危險。

sentences.english: I cannot send you one single flower from this wealth of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 我不能從春之富饒裏摘朵花兒送給你。

sentences.english: Beyond this ocean lies the rich subcontinent of India.
sentences.chinese: 海的那一邊有富饒的印度次大陸。

sentences.english: I can make Poland the most beautiful and prosperous place on earth.
sentences.chinese: 我可以讓波蘭成爲地球上最美麗富饒的地方”。

sentences.english: For the next six thousand Standard years, Cybertron was peaceful and prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的六千年裏，塞伯特恩是和平和富饒的。

sentences.english: The beautiful and rich Jianghan Plain has cultivated the Xiantao people's characteristics of diligence, filial piety and elegance.
sentences.chinese: 美麗富饒的江漢平原，孕育了仙桃人勤勞孝雅的品格。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said he felt very pleased for having the opportunity to visit the beautiful and richly endowed Sao Paulo State.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤表示很高興有機會訪問美麗富饒的聖保羅州。

sentences.english: So, if magnesium is so abundant, why is it so expensive?
sentences.chinese: 所以如果鎂是如此富饒，爲什麼它這麼貴呢？

sentences.english: The valleys to the north are more fruitful.
Or how shall we gather what griefs destroy Or bless the mellowing year.
sentences.chinese: 我們怎能收集悲哀毀去的保佑那富饒的年份。

sentences.english: Perelman has provided geometers with a fruitful land to cultivate.
sentences.chinese: 佩雷爾曼提供給幾何學家們一塊富饒的土地來耕作。

sentences.english: It was hilly and green, bordered with rich red soil.
sentences.chinese: 都是山丘和綠色，邊着富饒的紅土地。

definition: no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
to return to one's true self/to regain the natural state
